preset.description: Optional. Specify presetID or namespace:presetID to enable aim assist with the specified ID.

identifier.description: Namespaced identifier for Camera Preset. Namespace and name must be separated by a ':' and have at least one alphanumeric or underscore character.

pos_x.description: Optional. Set an X position for this camera's behavior.

rot_y.description: Optional. Set a Y rotation for this camera's behavior.

player_effects.description: Optional, defaults to false. Specify true to allow effects on the player to affect how the game renders when this preset is active.

inherit_from.description: Optional. Namespaced identifier for another camera preset from which to inherit values and behavior.

pos_y.description: Optional. Set a Y position for this camera's behavior.

rot_x.description: Optional. Set an X rotation for this camera's behavior.

pos_z.description: Optional. Set a Z position for this camera's behavior.

rotation_speed.description: Optional. Set the rotation speed for the camera.

snap_to_target.description: Optional. Set this flag if you want the camera to snap to your target immediately in the first frame. Only available with a valid rotation speed.

horizontal_rotation_limit.description: Optional. Set the horizontal rotation limit for the target camera (x, y), where x represents rotation to the left, and y to the right. Values can be from 0 to 360.0.

vertical_rotation_limit.description: Optional. Set the vertical rotation limit for the target camera (x, y). Values can be from 0.0 to 180.0 inclusive in world space where 0 degrees is straight down, 90 degrees is horizontal and 180 degrees is straight up.

continue_targeting.description: Optional. Set this flag if you want the camera to continue tracking the entity even when the target moves outside the valid rotation limits.

entity_offset.description: Optional. Changes the point of the entity the camera pivots around (x, y, z). x, y and z can be floats between -64 and 64

tracking_radius.description: Optional. Set a value for the block radius around the camera to keep tracking the target entity. Defaults to 50 blocks.

view_offset.description: Optional. Creates an over the shoulder type offset (x, y). x and y can be floats between -64 and 64

yaw_limits_min.description: Optional. Set a min limit for the yaw of third person cameras.

radius.description: Optional. Set a radius for this camera's behavior.

yaw_limits_max.description: Optional. Set a max limit for the yaw of third person cameras.

listener.title: enum SharedTypes::v1_21_80::CameraPreset::AudioListener
listener.description: Optional, defaults to 'camera'. Specify 'camera' or 'player' to control whether the camera or player is used for audio listening position when this preset is active.

align_target_and_camera_forward.description: Optional, defaults to true. When set to true the camera will be locked to have the same forward as its target

aim_assist.description: Optional. Aim-assist settings to activate when the camera preset is in use.

control_scheme.title: Control Scheme
control_scheme.description: Optional. Set a default scheme for this camera.
